definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Silver iodide nano-powder has been produced by salt of silver and iodide in an alcohol solvent.
sentences.chinese: 乙醇中採用銀鹽和碘化物製備碘化銀納米微粉。

sentences.english: The thickness of the silver iodide film is controlled by the concentration of the iodine and the reaction time.
sentences.chinese: 碘化銀膜的厚度主要由碘化的濃度和時間來控制。

sentences.english: A preliminary study suggests that 4 grams or 2 grams of AgI is desirable.
sentences.chinese: 初步認爲箭載碘化銀的劑量以載4克和2克爲好。

sentences.english: It was a compound called silver iodide.
sentences.chinese: 那是一種叫做碘化銀的化合物。
